notes.text:
KoG with Spellbooks. I think Im the 1st to rly use 3SD with them. I dont think my build is fully optimal, but I see the potential. I missplayed quite a bit at 1st, definitely not an easy deck to use. Its a lot of fun doe and rewards carefully managing your resources. 
I think Spellbooks def. have a place in the meta, Fate is just such a strong card and the engine is super consistent, I bricked once I think and even then was able to stall with Kazejin.
I obv use Kazejin because he is a spellcaster and with power is able to beat over the biggest mons in the meta.
Took me 36 wins total, started with a grass build in plat 4  but soon switched to this in legend because I wanted to try 3SD because it was actually the 1st thing I thought about when books were leaked.
